projects.text: Web app that gives users the ability to see relationships between different data sets, spot outliers, and track performance over time.
projects.title: Next Dashboard

projects.text: LakyPos-Web is a website built for LakyPos software which is a newer version of lakyPhonePOS. LakyPos software is a Point Of Sale app used to manage wholesale or retail shops.
projects.title: Laky-P.O.S

projects.text: A simple course demo website that allows students to sign up for a course. It shows the details of the course including the lecturer, Course descriptions, and Course activities. Built with JavaScript.
projects.title: Free Web Course

projects.text: This is my portfolio web project. It allows developers to present their personal projects. The project has different sections which include self-presentation, projects, about, and contact us form. Built using JavaScript.
projects.title: Portfolio V1

extra_projects.title: LakyPhone P.O.S
extra_projects.text: This is a Point-Of-Sales desktop app built specifically for managing mobile phone retail shops. It is a robust, scalable, and powerful app with a modern design (Dracula theme). The newer version of this app(LakyPos) is general-purpose and can be used in almost all settings.  Built with Python, PySide, and CSS.

extra_projects.title: To Do List
extra_projects.text: This app helps users to manage and organize their tasks. Users can add a new task, re-arrange tasks using drag and drop, remove tasks, edit a task description, mark tasks as completed, and remove all the completed tasks. Built with JavaScript.

extra_projects.title: Book Store
extra_projects.text: Book Store is a simple Single Page App (SPA) that allows users to make add,remove, and update books with respective author. Built with react .
